document_title: FortiVoice 5.0 Filter Bypass & Persistent Web Vulnerabilities

note.text: A vulnerablity in FortiVoice 5.0 web-application could allow malicious script being injected in the affected module; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
note.title: Summary

note.text: A vulnerablity in FortiVoice 5.0 web-application could allow malicious script being injected in the affected module; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
note.title: Description

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank Vulnerability Lab for reporting a FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer vulnerability under responsible disclosure.
